titleStmt.title: The case of Exeter-Colledge in the University of Oxford related and vindicated
titleStmt.author: Bury, Arthur, 1624-1713.
Washington, Joseph, d. 1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Randal Tayler,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Arthur Bury--LC-NUC author lists, 1942-1962. Also sometimes attributed to Joseph Washington--Halkett & Laing; British museum gen. cat.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
